Text: Is this the same one available on Apple's web site? If so, be advised it's buggy. I tried installing it on my computer and all I got was error messages. I thought it was a problem with my system until Google pointed me to an Apple forum where there were many more people saying they had the same problem. In fact their error messages were like mine.
great app man saved me a lot of time

doesnt work...download it and the installer comes with an error saying not a valid windows app. might be something I'm doing wrong but won't work for me
yeah it was me...didn't read that it was for windows 7..my bad
